section.heading: Short title.
section.text: This subchapter may be cited as the "Tenant Opportunity to Purchase Act of 1980".

annotations.annotation: For a requirement that the Department of Housing and Community Development issue a grant in the amount of $250,000 to the Coalition for Non-Profit Housing and Economic Development to conduct a study of Tenant Opportunity to Purchase Act outcomes, see § 2172 of D.C. Act 24-159.

For a requirement that the Department of Housing and Community Development issue a grant in the amount of $250,000 to the Coalition for Non-Profit Housing and Economic Development to conduct a study of Tenant Opportunity to Purchase Act outcomes and delivery it to the Council by September 30, 2022, see § 2172 of D.C. Law 24-45.

For a requirement that, the Department of Housing and Community Development issue a grant in the amount of $250,000 to the Coalition for Non-Profit Housing and Economic Development to conduct a study of Tenant Opportunity to Purchase Act outcomes and delivery it to the Council by June 30, 2023, see § 2122 of D.C. Act 24-470.

For a requirement that, the Department of Housing and Community Development issue a grant in the amount of $250,000 to the Coalition for Non-Profit Housing and Economic Development to conduct a study of Tenant Opportunity to Purchase Act outcomes and delivery it to the Council by June 30, 2023, see § 2122 of D.C. Law 24-167.
